name: In re NOMINATION PAPERS OF Michael J. CAVANAGH for Representative in the General Assembly for the 51st District. Appeal of Michael J. Cavanagh
name_abbreviation: In re Nomination Papers of Cavanagh

judges: Before CAPPY, C.J., CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN, SAYLOR, EAKIN, BAER, JJ.
parties: In re NOMINATION PAPERS OF Michael J. CAVANAGH for Representative in the General Assembly for the 51st District. Appeal of Michael J. Cavanagh.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 27th day of October, 2004, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Kenneth B. Burkley, for Robert Bowers.
casebody.head_matter:
860 A.2d 486
In re NOMINATION PAPERS OF Michael J. CAVANAGH for Representative in the General Assembly for the 51st District. Appeal of Michael J. Cavanagh.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted on Briefs Sept. 29, 2004.
Decided Oct. 27, 2004.
Michael Cavanagh, for Pro Se.
Kenneth B. Burkley, for Robert Bowers.
Before CAPPY, C.J., CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN, SAYLOR, EAKIN, BAER, JJ.
